publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4197.3 Tavish Scott: Bridge Tolls—As an amendment to motion (S2M-4197) in the name of Shona Robison, leave out from "agrees" to end and insert "notes the responses, analysis and conclusions set out in the recent consultation and review of Scotland’s tolled bridges, including the Tay Road Bridge Joint Board’s response; notes that the bridges review met all of the Board’s requests, and recommends an examination of the economic, social and environmental impact and cost of retaining or removing tolls from the Tay and Forth bridges, on Fife and Dundee, the proposals for which will be reported on as soon as possible." Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran*
